title: A generall martyrologie containing a collection of all the greatest persecutions which have befallen the church of Christ from the creation to our present times, both in England and other nations : whereunto are added two and twenty lives of English modern divines ... : as also the life of the heroical Admiral of France slain in the partisan massacre and of Joane Queen of Navar poisoned a little before / by Sa. Clarke.
author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Ratcliffe for Thomas Underhill and John Rothwell,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
